name: Nameless [Alpha]
description:
Hi guys. Nameless [Alpha] has been in development for the past 1 month and will continue to be in development until the game is finally ready to launch. 

Basically, how you would play the game is that you (as) a player need to dodge all enemies that will be spawning randomly. You can collect powerups but powerups will only be spawning at a certain time. Powerups can affect the player. If you collect a health powerup then the player will have more hearts and the enemy can hurt you but not kill you until the player has no hearts left.  Right now, there is one available game mode. In the future, I might consider on making more game modes and more maps.

CONTROLS Pc controls - W A S D Mobile controls - Joystick Nameless [Alpha] is now supporting multiple platforms.
  • Android
  • Windows
Platforms that is not supported by Nameless [Alpha]IOSGOOGLE PIXELLINUXCHROME OS
